channel.title: Runescape 2007 JAGEX
channel.description:
Hello sexy moparscapers,
JAGEX has confirmed that they will be getting Runescape 2007 back [b]if[/b] they manage to reach 50k+ votes of being wanting it back. If 750k+ people vote for Runescape 2007 to come back they'll be getting the Runescape back as it was before and everyone will get access to be a member forever (unknown amount of time).
The poll will be available this Friday on the Runescape site!
[b]My conclusion is, VOTE LIKE A MOTHERloveER![/b] PS: I'm so loveing happy.
